messageBody:
Mike Lin wrote:

> So I want to only start the receiving thread once per
> testcase and not once per test.

Notice that you are confusing the terminology somewhat.

A TestCase class is not a testcase (in the same way a Customer class is not
a single customer). A TestCase *instance* is a testcase. And as the default
way for Junit is to create one instance per test method, typically a test
method (what you probably called test above) is a testcase.

The whole TestCase class gets converted into a TestSuite instance containing
one TestCase instance per test method.

So what you actually want to do is starting the thread only once per test
suite...

Hope this helps,

Ilja
